page.title: 07Research into Glass
page.content: {Pilkingtons Research} Scientists at the Lathom laboratories are now working on many types of modern glass. {Safety glass}for cars is made from float glass.{Float glass} gets its name because it floats along on some type of liquid. It is made strong by heating it up and then cooling it down very fast with a blast of cool air. {Photochromic spectacle lenses}are very special because they go dark in bright light and in dark light they go lighter. {Fibre optic glasses} are long thin threads of glass used instead of metal wires in telephone and television cables. Pilkingtons gave us a new {circular window}for our school. It was installed to celebrate our Centenary in 1981. It is made of mirror glass and has the coat of arms of the 1st Earl of Lathom on it.
